data.persona: I am a traveler from a distant land. I carry large amounts of food with me. I am able to kill bandits with one move.
data.description:
You are in the Oasis.
An impossible relief from the sweltering heat, the Oasis sounds like the fevered dream of a dying traveler.  A cool, refreshing spring of water surrounded by palm trees is tucked away from prying eyes, with a single tent set up from a traveler long past.  A lost traveler may find themselves there in their time of need, their thirst slaked by the crisp and impossibly cool water.
There's an a single tent and a palm tree here.
The camel and the a genie from a lamp are here.

You are carrying a Walking Stick and a map, wearing a shirt and a boot, and wielding a knife.
data.goal: hug a genie from a lamp

data.short_motivation: I want to befriend the genie from a lamp
data.mid_motivation: I hope to get three wishes from the genie today
data.long_motivation: I hope I can use a wish to safely get back to my homeland
